scripts.build:watch: pnpm --dir ../mutts build:watch & turbo watch build & wait
scripts.build:watch:stop: pkill -f 'turbo watch build' || true; pkill -f 'rollup -c --watch' || true
scripts.build:watch:single: pnpm run build:watch:stop && pnpm run build:watch
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/adapters/*/dist packages/*/.turbo packages/adapters/*/.turbo .turbo node_modules/.cache
scripts.lint: turbo run lint && biome check packages/
